section_one.title: Eventamin is free for ever!
section_one.description: Eventamin is the first & only platform that the event and exhibition buyers find, meet and contact with suppliers directly. A B2B and B2C directory dedicated to the event & exhibition industry buyers and sellers from anywhere in the world. Suppliers can open a free of charge company profile to present their services to our massive buyer network. Our purpose is to make sourcing easier and more effective, saving time and money for the buyers, while driving business to the companies that have registered a public profile.

section_two.title: Who is Eventamin?
section_two.description: Eventamin Means Event & Exhibition Support and is a leading global directory for the Event & Exhibition industry. We provide an ever growing network which is characterised by transparency and quality. Eventamin does not just increasing exposure for suppliers but also makes information readily available to buyers. Find Supplier in more than 180 countries or be found as Organisers, Booth Builders, site owner or any other provider!
